meanings.definition: Capable of being teased or provoked.
meanings.sent1: The kitten was so teasable that even a gentle touch made it jump.
meanings.sent2: Her teasable nature made her the perfect target for playful jokes.
meanings.sent3: The teasable puppy kept chasing its own tail in circles, much to everyone's amusement.
meanings.sent4: His teasable temper was like a ticking time bomb, ready to explode at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The teasable fabric felt soft to the touch but easily wrinkled with the slightest movement.

meanings.definition: Able to be easily teased or provoked.
meanings.sent1: The teasable child giggled uncontrollably when tickled.
meanings.sent2: She had a teasable personality that attracted playful banter from her friends.
meanings.sent3: The teasable squirrel kept stealing nuts from the other animals, causing a commotion.
meanings.sent4: His teasable ego was like a fragile glass, easily shattered by criticism.
meanings.sent5: The teasable balloon popped with a loud bang when touched by a sharp object.
